column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Great ambiance/atmosphere and the service was impeccable! I especially appreciated how attentive the staff were
column2: immediately removing plates when we were finished. Our waitress was incredibly helpful with offering up suggestions and explaining the tapas concept. Bread was given to us upon arrival and I don't know anyone who doesn't love a little freebie to begin a meal! The food came out rather quickly despite the large crowd on a Friday night. We ordered several small plates of food and two of our favorites were the short rib and the beef empanada. It was a bit expensive but a nice little treat!
